bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make honey! Who am I?
I have spots and can fly. I am red, but sometimes yellow! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often found in gardens
🌱 I eat aphids that hurt plants

bug.question: I march in a line and carry crumbs. I live in a colony underground. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very small but very strong
🏠 I build big homes under the ground

bug.question: I hop around and have strong legs. I am green and like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am not a frog, but I jump like one

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then transform into a chrysalis, after which I can fly with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 My wings have many different colors
🐛 I change a lot during my life

bug.question: I can light up at night. I am a flying beetle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and black during the day

bug.question: I spin a web and catch other bugs. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Some people are scared of me

bug.question: I live in water as a nymph and zoom around really fast. As an adult, I have big eyes and catch other bugs in the air! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 You can find me near ponds
✈️ I have a long body and two sets of wings

bug.question: I look like a stick to blend in with branches. I eat leaves and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I am very long and skinny

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I can be green or brown. I sit still and wait to catch my food with quick arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I look like I am praying

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and cover most of the Earth. What am I?
I am a colorful fish with stripes. People keep me in tanks. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 You might see me in an aquarium.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squeeze through tight spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🧪 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I'm a very large sea creature with a tail and I sing a song. What am I?
I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. I walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 Some people eat me for dinner.

ocean.question: I look like a star and live on the ocean floor. I can grow back my arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐 If I lose an arm, I can make a new one.

ocean.question: I float in the ocean and sting if you touch me. I have no brain or bones. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ Be careful, I can give you a little shock.

ocean.question: I’m a fish that can light up in the deep, dark ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my head.
🔦 I use my light to find food.
🌑 I live where it is very dark

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that hides in the sand. Both of my eyes are on the same side of my head. What am I?
